title: Life in the deep oceans
description: With vibrant video clips captured by submarines, David Gallo takes us to some of Earth's darkest, most violent, toxic and beautiful habitats, the valleys and volcanic ridges of the oceans' depths, where life is bizarre, resilient and shockingly abundant.
author: David Gallo
keywords: TED, talks, animals, geology, life, oceans, science, submarine, technology, marine biology
